wikitext.*:
BardOfArda is a TikToker and content creator, that makes short skits and song parodies about ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and [[Tolkien]]'s [[Legendarium]]. He is the editor of the Tolkien with Friends podcast.<ref>https://tolkienwithfriends.com/2024/07/28/bard-of-arda-joins-tolkien-with-friends/</ref> 
==Tolkien Related Songs and Parodies==

*“We Didn’t Start The Fire” The Silmarillion Edition
*Eärendil was a Wellerman
*“Welcome to the Fellowship” (MCR Parody)
*“Hey There Goldberry” by Plain White Toms (parody)
*“Durin’s Song” in the style of Johnny Cash
*Take Me Home, Forest Road (Misty Mountains Parody)
*Radagast (Rasputin Parody)
*"I'll be" Rings of Power Edition
*The ShillMarillion: The Musical
*Yo-Ho Pharazôn
*Far over the Misty mountians cold New Jersey
*Tom Bombadil Song
*Kings and Queens of Númenor
*Dragon-Helm
*Oromë summons the Elves To Valinor
*Mandos, the Doom Maker
*I am just a ranger
*Prancing Pony Inn Duet
*My Ol’ Gaffer’s favorite song
